name: Hoot Loot: FREE Vegas Slot Game
name_original: Hoot Loot: FREE Vegas Slot Game
description:
Introducing Hoot Loot, one of the newest slot apps in High 5 Casino’s family of mobile apps! Now you can play one of the most successful Las Vegas slot games from the comfort of your home or while on the go on your mobile device. In the forest of fun, the Hoot Line and Hoo's Safe Bonus lead to soaring jackpots! Download now for FREE and collect your Welcome Bonus to get started!

Hoot Loot is FREE and EASY to play!
• Play up to 20 lines in this 5 reel slot game
• Win on the Hoot Line for a payout that’s 22x your bet
• Choose wisely in the Hoo’s Safe Bonus to earn huge payouts
• Earn free daily coin rewards just for logging in
• Collect free bonus coins any time for non-stop play
• Login with Facebook or play anonymously
• New features coming soon…

Stay tuned for High 5 Casino’s entire suite of individual mobile slot games coming soon – Double Da Vinci Diamonds, Golden Knight, Purr A Few Dollars More, Shadow of the Panther, and Triple Raven. Explore High 5 Casino’s full portfolio of 150+ Vegas slot games at https://www.high5games.com!

NOTE: Hoot Loot is designed for iPad 2 and higher, iPhone 4 and higher, and iPod Touch 5th generation running iOS6 and above. Devices older than those listed may experience performance issues. We apologize for any inconvenience.

Have more questions? Visit the High 5 Help Center, https://high5games.zendesk.com, to browse answers to the most commonly asked player questions.

Due to the authentic nature of Hoot Loot, all users are required to be 18 years or older to play. By downloading the app, you agree you are at least 18 years old and comply with all local laws pertaining to social gaming.

DISCLAIMER:
Hoot Loot does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money. It is intended for FREEMIUM entertainment purposes only.
